title: Of Peace of Mind
creator: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
description: LibriVox recording of Of Peace of Mind, by Lucius Annaeus Seneca. How to maintain a tranquil mind amongst social upheaval and turmoil, addressed to Serenus. (Introduction by Jonathan Hockey) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: Classics; philosophy; advice; Librivox; audiobook
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
